name: Pandora's Cleaning Simulator
description:
Submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Are you going crazy? Maybe, but it's most likely the game messing with you! What would happen if you opened pandora's box in the house of a cleaning lunatic? 

Most likely this game.

Controls:

E - Clean

WASD - Movement

Objective:

SURVIVE

Nah, just keep the bar in the top left at least 20% filled and you will survive! Try and beat my high score of 18 minutes I dare you.
